snippet.textDisplay: I might be very wrong as I haven't played the Wii Sonic 1-2 punch of Secret Rings and Black Knight, but I do believe they weren't too bad. Again and as always, the music was certainly awesome. I also know that Sonic wielding a sword just doesn't feel right.
snippet.textOriginal: I might be very wrong as I haven't played the Wii Sonic 1-2 punch of Secret Rings and Black Knight, but I do believe they weren't too bad. Again and as always, the music was certainly awesome. I also know that Sonic wielding a sword just doesn't feel right.

snippet.textDisplay: I can't help but get a Ocarina of Time vibe from this. Did they try to hit the Zelda road with this score.
snippet.textOriginal: I can't help but get a Ocarina of Time vibe from this. Did they try to hit the Zelda road with this score.

snippet.textDisplay:
The gist from playing both and even the comments is that Secret Rings shined in some places but failed painfully in others, thus making it "good" and/or "flawed, bad", while Black Knight is just consistently mediocre.
The music from both is pretty good, though.
snippet.textOriginal:
The gist from playing both and even the comments is that Secret Rings shined in some places but failed painfully in others, thus making it "good" and/or "flawed, bad", while Black Knight is just consistently mediocre.
The music from both is pretty good, though.

snippet.textDisplay: Secret Rings is good in places, but awful in others (mostly due to the motion controls). Black Knight was surprisingly good considering all of the hate that it gets, but it's also REALLY short, which is great for a $7 game, but I can see why people would be angry with paying $50 for it when it came out.
snippet.textOriginal: Secret Rings is good in places, but awful in others (mostly due to the motion controls). Black Knight was surprisingly good considering all of the hate that it gets, but it's also REALLY short, which is great for a $7 game, but I can see why people would be angry with paying $50 for it when it came out.

snippet.textDisplay: Luckily, the third Wii Sonic game ended up being very good and I feel brought the series back out of a dry period after somewhat mediocre games.  Speaking of that, I need to play Generations.  I have it on my computer, but I just haven't played much of it.
snippet.textOriginal: Luckily, the third Wii Sonic game ended up being very good and I feel brought the series back out of a dry period after somewhat mediocre games.  Speaking of that, I need to play Generations.  I have it on my computer, but I just haven't played much of it.

snippet.textDisplay: This song isn't super original or anything but, I think it's pretty stuff like this from the weirdest sources- that proves weirdness and autisms are far from bad. That's at least what I thought while listening to this song, while imagining the whole Sega and Sonic thing they've had going on, modernly with their community. It's not evil because it is flawed. And by evil I mean, it doesn't deserve the evilness of people hating it for- simply their dislike of it. I think the most called out upon autistic stuff us humangs carry around is something that exists above the negativity that we all to often throw at it. Sorry for my autism though.
snippet.textOriginal: This song isn't super original or anything but, I think it's pretty stuff like this from the weirdest sources- that proves weirdness and autisms are far from bad. And by evil I mean, it doesn't deserve the evilness of people hating it for- simply their dislike of it. I think the most called out upon autistic stuff us humangs carry around is something that exists above the negativity that we all to often throw at it. Sorry for my autism though.

The game itself was alright. Haven't played it in years though so opinions may change.

snippet.textDisplay: I remember always hearing this back when I had the game. It would always cause me to zone out and just listen to the music. Even now, I still can't help and just stop and listen to it. Easily one of my favorite sonic osts in the franchise. Though the game could be a little better...

snippet.textDisplay:
Secret Rings is good, if pretty flawed.
Black Knight, not so much.
Also I thought Sonic with a sword was actually a pretty good idea, all things considered.
